items.sentence: That was so long ago that I hardly remember anything about it.
I didn't get out of bed this morning as early as I usually do.
By the time Tom had turned thirty, he'd gone completely blind.
I doubt very seriously Tom will be present at today's meeting.
Tom wanted to buy a jacket, but he couldn't find one he liked.
Tom spent all the money he had to buy Mary a birthday present.
I can't remember the last time that I had a drink with a girl.
At night, when others are asleep, I often listen to the radio.
Tom found out why Mary didn't want to go on a picnic with him.
You don't have to come right now, but please come before 2:30.
